item.title: GAS Library - UnzipGs
item.description: Overview This is a GAS library for unzipping a Zip file protected by a password using Google Apps Script. Description Recently, I had a situation that it is required to unzip a Zip file protected with the password. But unfortunately, in the current stage, the method of Utilities.unzip() cannot unzip such protected files. So when I had been looking for the other workarounds, I found zlib.js. Especially, it’s unzip.min.js. This is created for Javascript.
